text: is a town in Saga Prefecture, Japan. It is the first town in Saga to have its name spelled in hiragana, not kanji. Miyaki is the name of the town and the town's district. ==Geography== Miyaki is in the eastern part of Saga Prefecture. It is about east of Saga City and south of Fukuoka. ==Other websites== * Miyaki official website Category:Towns in Japan Category:Settlements in Saga Prefecture
title: Miyaki, Saga
